q.quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
q.author: Buddha

q.quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
q.author: Emily Dickinson

q.quote: Reputation is what men and women think of us; character is what God and angels know of us.
q.author: Thomas Paine

q.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
q.author: Benjamin Franklin

q.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
q.author: Jim Rohn

q.quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
q.author: Peter Ustinov

q.quote: I just find myself happy with the simple things. Appreciating the blessings God gave me.
q.author: DMX

q.quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
q.author: Dr. Seuss

q.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
q.author: William Penn

q.quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
q.author: Melody Beattie

q.quote: Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
q.author: Bobby Unser

q.quote: Poetry is an echo, asking a shadow to dance.
q.author: Bobby Unser

q.quote: A beautiful woman delights the eye; a wise woman, the understanding; a pure one, the soul.
q.author: Minna Antrim

q.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
q.author: Gerald R. Ford

q.quote: There is no pain so great as the memory of joy in present grief.
q.author: Aeschylus
